select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri <> b.ma_vi_tri and a.ma_vi_tri like rtrim(b.ma_vi_tri) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4;
